Example: int sum = accumulate( array.begin(), array.end(), 0, accumumulate_cb(mem_fun(&ArrayItem::func) ) ); (if func returns type int)

Definition at line 60 of file STLUtility.h.

References MC2String::find().

template<typename Container, typename Key>
bool has (  const Container &  other,
const Key &  key
) 
 

Returns true if container has key.

This is a more expressive way than to use the: 

 if ( container.find( key ) != container.end() ) {
    // .. do stuff ..
 }
compare this to: 
 if ( has( container, key ) ) {
   // .. do stuff ..
 }

)

Definition at line 370 of file STLUtility.h.

template<typename T>
select2nd<typename T::value_type> makeSelect2nd (  const T &  container  ) 
 

Use this to determine select2nd type, instead of explicitly typing name.

Example: 

    map<key, value> values; 
    // old style:
    transform( values.begin(), values.end(), 
               someothercontainer.begin(), select2nd< map< key, value > >() );
    // new style:
    transform( values.begin(), values.end(),
               someothercontainer.begin(), makeSelect2nd( values ) );
